Class TransactionsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • lib.GBController
          • controllers.TransactionsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class TransactionsController
extends GBController
    Manages loading of pages related to transactions
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dean Papastrat

      • index

        public play.mvc.Result index(int saleId)
        Renders a list of all transactions for the specified sale
        Parameters:
        saleId - id of the sale we want transactions for
        Returns:
        a webpage showing transactions

      • create

        public play.mvc.Result create(int saleId)
        Renders an empty form to create a transaction for a sale
        Parameters:
        saleId - id of the sale we want to create a transaction for
        Returns:
        a webpage showing the transaction form

      • postCreate

        public play.mvc.Result postCreate(int saleId)
        Creates a transaction using data passed from the form submission and either displays the form with validation errors or redirects to the transaction display page
        Parameters:
        saleId - id of the sale to create the transaction for
        Returns:
        a redirect to the transaction's add item page

      • show

        public play.mvc.Result show(int id)
        Displays a transaction and its associated details
        Parameters:
        id - id of the transaction to show
        Returns:
        a webpage showing the transaction's details

        Returns:

        public play.mvc.Result items(int id)
        Renders a page that allows the user to add and remove items from a transaction
        Parameters:
        id - id of the transaction to view
        Returns:
        a webpage with a list of items on the transaction and available items

        public play.mvc.Result addItem(int id,
                               int itemId)
        Adds an item to the specified transaction
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a redirect to the list of items to add

        Returns:

      • postDelete

        public play.mvc.Result postDelete(int id)
        Deletes the specified transaction from the system
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the transaction to delete
        Returns:
        a redirect to the transactions index for the sale
